alert.note: Alert for Central Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 4:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Marion County through 445 PM EDT... At 417 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ocklawaha, or 7 miles north of The Villages, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocklawaha, Silver Springs Shores, Lake Weir, Santos and Belleview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
